short_summary: Short description of this contract is to support the temporary workload tide shift and secure resources to add to the Digital Services Branch (DSB) of PSPC to work in cloud.
description: The scope of this contract is to secure additional resources to support the temporary workload.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Announcement Details
### Title: 
Computer, Application Support - Temporary Help Services

### Reffference Tag:
cb-404-73183984

### Amendment No:
3

### Tender No:
10077686

### Publication Date:
October 6, 2023

### Closing Date: 
October 23, 2023, at 14:00

## Tender Description 
The contract for Computer, Application Support Temporary Help Services aims to address a temporary workload increase for Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) – Digital Services Branch (DSB) either due to increased demand or business as usual activities.

## Specifications
- **Scope of Work:** Implementing additional resources to support PSPC’s Digital Services Branch workload migration to cloud services
- **Contract Category:** Service
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering
- **Selection Method:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Region:** National Capital Region

## Contact Information
- **Name:** Emilie Charbonneau
- **Email:** emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** (873) 355-4701

## Supporting Document
The full tender notice can be accessed by visiting the following webpage:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21585/10077686---npp_0.pdf

Note: Original tender text suffers from brevity, clarity, and overall concision, resulting in the need for re-wording and re-phrasing to improve readability. The rewritten text also included an addendum section where issues which are not present in the given sample data were highlighted. In the event any of those field do get populated, then the word can properly replace the placeholders.
